DOC.brief_summary: Clinical and radiographic assessment of Biodentine® as a pulp dressing material for pulpotomy treatment in human primary molars.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of the Effectiveness of Biodentine® in Pulpotomies Primary Teeth
DOC.criteria: one or more primary teeth which requires pulpotomy. not healthy patients, patients with teeth which requires pulpectomy.
